name: 3dMEPFM
author: AFNI Developers
description: Voxelwise deconvolution of Multiecho fMRI data to yield time-varying estimates of changes in transverse relaxation (DR2*) and optionally, net magnetization (DS0)

inputs.description: Dataset to analyze with Multiecho Paradigm Free Mapping, along with the echo time
inputs.name: Input files

inputs.description: Enable R to save the parameters in .3dMEPFM.dbg.AFNI.args in the current directory
inputs.name: Debug arguments flag

inputs.description: Process voxels inside this mask only. Default is no masking.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Haemodynamic response function used for deconvolution
inputs.name: HRF model

inputs.description: Verbosity level. 0 for quiet, 1 (default) or more: talkative.
inputs.name: Verbosity level

output-files.description: Changes in R2* parameter, assumed to represent neuronal-related signal changes
output-files.name: DR2 output volume

output-files.description: Convolution of DR2 with HRF, one volume per echo
output-files.name: DR2fit output volume

output-files.description: Estimate of the noise standard deviation after wavelet decomposition for each input dataset
output-files.name: Sigmas MAD output volume

output-files.description: Cost function to select the regularization parameter (lambda) according to selection criterion
output-files.name: Costs output volume
